full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Notice Title

 Stream to Sea Program Delivery and Coordination Services for Schools on Vancouver Island

#### Notice Type 

Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Background Information

Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites proposals from contractors to provide delivery and coordination services for the Stream to Sea Program. The program aims to engage local communities, First Nations, and community groups in the development and delivery of education and outreach activities focused on salmon conservation and sustainability.

#### Required Services

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing delivery and coordination services across the school year in the following geographic areas:

 * Parksville, Qualicum (School District 69)
 * Comox Valley (School District 71)
 * Vancouver Island West (School District 84)

The services will include:

 * Coordinating and assisting with the setup and maintenance of classroom incubators (aquaria)
 * Delivering salmon eggs to schools
 * Providing classroom sessions on salmon life cycle, fish dissections, aquatic ecosystems, and habitat requirements
 * Troubleshooting and maintenance support for aquaria in schools
 * Developing and delivering a spring fry release program for participating schools
 * Participating in live transports of adult and juvenile salmon and spawning of broodstock (as needed)

#### Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

The contractor will be evaluated based on their ability to deliver high-quality services, collaborate with community groups and educators, and meet the program's outcomes and objectives.

#### Submission Requirements

To be considered, proposers must submit their proposals electronically through the Canada Buys portal. The RFP documents, including the scope of work and evaluation criteria, are available on the portal.

#### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: September 22, 2022 at 1:00 p.m. EST
* Note: The tender is already expired, but the RFP documents are available for reference purposes.

#### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

 Claire Lavoie
Email: [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
Phone: 506-282-2340
Address: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, NB E3C 2M6

#### Relevant Trade Agreements

This tender notice is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement,
